title: NFL Combine Winners & Losers, Post-Combine Mock Draft Monday (Football 3/2)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson to recap the NFL Combine. The guys issue grades for the new primetime nature of the event before addressing who saw their stock rise (14:00) and who saw their stock fall (30:30) during the week in Indianapolis. That's followed by a breakdown of Ryan's post-combine Mock Draft (40:15), evaluating how the quarterbacks will be selected, when the first wide receiver will be picked, the strength of the OL class and much more.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
